column2: "You have the photon energy thing down pat. You'll make a good Force."
"Remember, Forces have one role only. We use techniques. That's it. But it's more than enough."
"Charged techniques are especially powerful. It's something every Force should master."
"On the downside, Forces have low HP. That's because we divert a lot of photon energy outside of ourselves."
"Still, Forces are a powerful class. You should become one. I'll work with you if you want."
